Equipment Validation

Equipment Validation with IoT: Streamlining Electronic Data Capture

How a KSA-based quality consulting company implemented GoVal's IoT-enabled validation solution to automate equipment validation and maintenance activities for their pharmaceutical clients.

The Challenge

The customer is a KSA-based quality consulting company providing consultancy to healthcare and food industries. The company, established in 2013, has a group of consultants located globally from varied expertise and backgrounds.

They needed to implement GoVal solution for one of their pharmaceutical customers to automate validation and maintenance activities, specifically focusing on equipment validation with IoT integration for real-time data capture.

The Solution

  • IoT Device Integration: Connected equipment sensors for continuous monitoring
  • Automated Data Capture: Real-time equipment parameter logging
  • Digital Validation Protocols: Paperless validation workflows
  • Maintenance Scheduling: AI-powered predictive maintenance alerts

Results Achieved

75%
Reduction in validation time
100%
Paperless validation process
50%
Decrease in compliance costs

Key Benefits

The implementation of GoVal's IoT-enabled validation solution resulted in significant improvements in efficiency, accuracy, and compliance for the pharmaceutical client.

Project Details

Industry: Pharmaceutical
Location: Saudi Arabia
Solution: Equipment Validation + IoT
Timeline: 6 months
